## Games Inspired by Tarkovsky's Solaris

Fort Solis (2023) is a psychological sci-fi thriller that explicitly drew inspiration from films including Solaris (1972), as well as other sci-fi horror classics like Alien, Moon, and Sunshine. The developers aimed to combine the psychological aspects of Tarkovsky's film with the "isolated, industrial style" of Dead Space.

## 2024 Sci-Fi Horror Gaming Renaissance

2024 appears to have been "a spectacular year for creative and/or innovative low-budget sci-fi horror games," with many focusing on narrative, character, and psychological horror elements. Notable releases included "Hollowbody", "MiSide", "Mouthwashing" and "Winion Virus".

## Ocean-themed Psychological Horror Elements

The original Solaris film revolves around a space station orbiting an enigmatic oceanic planet, where the crew is plagued by strange phenomena caused by the planet's mysterious ability to manifest physical representations of human memories. The ocean acts as a mirror, reflecting the deepest desires and fears of those who encounter it.

## Related Sci-Fi Horror Games

- Mouthwashing is described as "a first-person perspective psychological horror game with low-poly PS1 graphics" focusing on "survivors on a delivery spaceship which is stranded in space after a crash"
